file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-46-02-04 - LOGOTYPE LIGHT LAMP - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL LOGOTYPE LIGHT LAMP - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the Logotype Lights. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 33-46-02-000-801-A LOGOTYPE LIGHTS - REMOVAL ALL 33-46-02-400-801-A LOGOTYPE LIGHTS - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-46-02 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-46-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. LOGOTYPE LIGHTS - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the logotype lights. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 333 333BB Horizontal stabilizer - LH 334 334BB Horizontal stabilizer - RH C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE On the under surfaces of the left and right 1 Does the task horizontal stabilizers H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure the LOGO switch, on the overhead panel, is in the OFF position. I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) (For aircraft with lens with inserts installed) Remove the screws (4) and inserts (3) to remove the access panel (2). (2) (For aircraft with lens without inserts installed) Remove the screws (4) to remove the access panel (2). (3) Remove the four screws (7) and washers (6). (4) Remove the support (8). (5) Remove the electrical connections (1). (6) Remove the lamp (5). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-46-02 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Logotype Lights - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 334 B A ZONE 333 DET. A 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTION 8. SUPPORT 2. ACCESS PANEL 5. LAMP 6. WASHER (4) 7. SCREW (4) 1 3. INSERT (8) DET. B 2 4. SCREW (8) 1 ONLY FOR AIRCRAFT WITH LENS WITH INSERT. 2 APPLY TORQUE: 2.26 - N.m (20 - lb.in) EM145AMM330094D.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-46-02 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-46-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. LOGOTYPE LIGHTS - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the logotype lights. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 33-46-00-700-801-A/500 LOGOTYPE LIGHTS - OPERATIONAL TEST C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 333 333BB Horizontal stabilizer - LH 334 334BB Horizontal stabilizer - RH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE On the under surfaces of the left and right 1 Does the task horizontal stabilizers I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the electrical connections (1). (2) Install the lamp (5). (3) Install the support (8). (4) Install the four washers (6) and screws (7). (5) (For aircraft with lens with inserts installed) Install the inserts (3) and screws (4) to install the access panel (2). NOTE: Apply torque of 2,26 N.m (20 lbf.in) to avoid deformation of the inserts. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-46-02 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (6) (For aircraft with lens without inserts installed) Install the screws (4) to install the access panel (2). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Do the operational test of the Logotype Lights (AMM TASK 33-46-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-46-02 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
